web_snippets: Regina Nuzzo is a professor of statistics at Gallaudet University in Washington D.C., a liberal arts school for deaf and hard-of-hearing students.
Regina Nuzzo is a freelance science writer and professor ... Currently she's a Professor teaching Statistics in American Sign Language at Gallaudet University ...
